name: Katana Zero DLC
summary: This isn't a Chronos hallucination - the free Katana ZERO DLC is finally nearing completion. Get ready to continue Zero's journey right where it left off - and glimpse into his murky past. Featuring all new characters, levels, gameplay and story, this massive DLC promises to be worth the wait. Come play, my lord.
